mapper.insert: insert into go_prescription( GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_MEDICINE_CODE, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_INJECTION_NUMBER, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_DOSAGE, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_TOTAL_DATE, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_USAGE, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_WRITE_DATE, GO_PRESCRIPTION_RESULT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goPrescriptionResultCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goMedicineCode}, #{goPrescriptionResultInjectionNumber}, #{goPrescriptionResultDosage}, #{goPrescriptionResultTotalDate}, #{goPrescriptionResultUsage}, #{goPrescriptionResultWriteDate}, now() )

insert into go_surgery_result( GO_SURGERY_RESULT_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_SURGERY_CODE, GO_SURGERY_RESULT_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_SURGERY_RESULT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goSurgeryResultCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goSurgeryCode}, #{goSurgeryResultRegistrationDate}, now() )

insert into go_hospitalization( GO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_HOSPITALIZATION_ENTER_DATE, GO_HOSPITALIZATION_EXIT_DATE, GO_HOSPITALIZATION_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goHospitalizationCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goHospitalizationEnterDate}, #{goHospitalizationExitDate}, now() )

insert into go_diagnosis( GO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_DISEASE_CODE, GO_TREATMENT_WRITE_DATE, GO_DIAGNOSIS_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goDiagnosisCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goDiseaseCode}, #{goTreatmentWriteDate}, now() )

insert into go_vaccination_result( GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_VACCINATION_CODE, GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_DEGREE, GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_VACCINATION_RESULT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goVaccinationResultCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goVaccinationCode}, #{goVaccinationResultDegree}, #{goVaccinationResultRegistrationDate}, now() )

insert into go_test_image_result( GO_IMAGE_TEST_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_PATH, GO_IMAGE_TEST_FILE_NAME, GO_IMAGE_TEST_DATE, GO_IMAGE_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goImageTestCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goImageTestFilePath}, #{goImageTestFileName}, #{goImageTestDate}, now() )

insert into go_test_checkup_result( GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_FILE_PATH, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_FILE_NAME, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_CHECKUP_DATE, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_CHECKUP_RESULT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goCheckupResultCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goCheckupResultFilePath}, #{goCheckupResultFileName}, #{goCheckupResultCheckupDate}, #{goCheckupResultRegistrationDate}, now() )

insert into go_chart( GO_CHART_CODE, GO_CITIZEN_ID, GO_HOSPITAL_ID, GO_CHART_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_CHART_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goCitizenId}), #{goCitizenId}, #{goHospitalId}, #{goChartRegistrationDate}, now() )

insert into go_test_blood_result( GO_BLOOD_TEST_CODE, GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_BLOOD_TEST_BLOOD_SUGAR, GO_BLOOD_TEST_PLATELET, GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_PATH, GO_BLOOD_TEST_FILE_NAME, GO_BLOOD_TEST_DATE, GO_BLOOD_TEST_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goBloodTestCode}), #{goTreatCode}, #{goBloodTestBloodSugar}, #{goBloodTestPlatelet}, #{goBloodTestFilePath}, #{goBloodTestFileName}, #{goBloodTestDate}, now() )

insert into go_treat( GO_TREAT_CODE, GO_HOSPITAL_ID, GO_CITIZEN_ID, GO_DOCTOR_ID, GO_TREAT_SUBJECT_CODE, GO_CHART_CODE, GO_TREAT_CONTENTS, GO_TREAT_REGISTRATION_DATE, GO_TREAT_GO_REGISTRATION_DATE ) values( concat(#{hospitalCode},'_',#{goTreatCode}), #{goHospitalId}, #{goCitizenId}, #{goDoctorId}, #{goTreatSubjectCode}, #{goChartCode}, #{goTreatContents}, #{goTreatRegistrationDate}, now() )
